item.title: JD(S) demands water release for second crop in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[A procession under the leadership of Janata Dal(S) State youth wing president Nikhil Kumaraswamy and the former Minister Venkatrao Nadagouda was taken out in Sindhanur on Tuesday demanding that the State government provide water for a second crop such as paddy and jowar in Raichur district.
The procession began at the Kote Eranna Temple and concluded at APMC Gunj in the city.
Addressing a gathering of farmers and party workers, Nikhil Kumaraswamy said that the Congress government has done noth...]]>
